name: Lisa's Sax
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Al Jean, Dan Greaney (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Homer recounts the story of Bart's first day of school, which corresponds with the story of how Lisa got her saxophone.
